subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Copeland, a 3-point-shooting big man, caused the Pacers matchup problems in Game 5 as the Knicks returned to lineups that were successful in the regular season.
snippet: Chris Copeland, a 3-point-shooting big man, caused the Pacers matchup problems in Game 5 as the Knicks returned to lineups that were successful in the regular season.
